Player History
Injured on 4/5/1954 with a Fractured Hip, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 8/19/1956 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Injured on 9/1/1957 with a Bruised Foot, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/16/1958 with a Knocked Out Teeth, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1960, off James Van Gundy (MAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1960, off Thomas Casey (PG)...
Released by Malibu on 4/1/1963...
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1967...
Traded from Wisconsin to Ashburn on 3/2/1967 (Going to Ash: P W. Morning. Going to WIS: P J. Fichter)...
Injured on 7/11/1968 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 8/27/1969 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/22/1971 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/8/1973 with a Stiff Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 7/4/1973 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/30/1974...
Injured on 5/22/1974 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 4/30/1978 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/25/1979 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Ashburn on 2/1/1980 to a 5-year deal worth $6,500,000 per year...
